thread.title: ReachIvy Announces its official Educational Blog Launch
thread.title_full: ReachIvy Announces its official Educational Blog Launch | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: ReachIvy Announces its official Educational Blog Launch
text:
(MENAFN Press) logo (1) MUMBAI India - Oct. 12 2015 - PRLog -- ReachIvy is a premium education and careers advisory that helps aspiring students get accepted into Ivy League and other top schools globally and reach their career aspirations through personal mentoring online services and a wealth of knowledge accumulated over years of experience.ReachIvy recently launched their official blog. The education space is a dynamic one stay tuned with the ReachIvy blog for the latest happenings. Stay informed by subscribing to the ReachIvy blogVisit blog here http://www.reachivy.com/blogFounder and CEO of ReachIvy Vibha Kagzi says ''I believe that education is the ultimate social equalizer and I am happy to share our experiences to benefit students on their study abroad queries.''Who is the ReachIvy blog relevant for?If you are interested in learning tips and tricks for applying to top schools from alumni or want to learn from their experiences want to hear about what admissions committees are looking for in your application you should subscribe to the ReachIvy blog.What can you read on the ReachIvy blog?Alumni from top schools academicians educationists and thought leaders write about their experiences and give their opinions on changing trends to a captive and intelligent audience with the most powerful tool - Words.What are some of the articles featured?Any subject that is related to study abroad can be read on the blog. Some articles you will find are:1. Study abroad applicant strategies2. Cracking the college application - Our to 10 tips3. College selection strategies4. ROI on your MBA5. 5 reasons to build your network and shrink your universeAbout ReachIvyReachIvy helps with guidance for High School Undergraduate Masters Masters in Business Administration (MBA) Executive Education and PhD programs.Vibha Kagzi Founder and CEO ReachIvy holds an MBA from the Harvard Business School and a Bachelor of Science from Carnegie Mellon University. She has also pursued courses at the University of California Berkeley the London School of Economics and the Indian School of Business.ReachIvy''s global team of counselors have also acquired their degrees from premier institutes and are passionate about sharing their experiences with students worldwide.Email us on to discuss your study abroad and career trajectory. ContactNishreen Darukhanawalla022 61155234--- End ---
